title: Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs a try. One serving contains 543 calories, 17g of protein, and 16g of fat. For $1.57 per serving, this recipe covers 22% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 2. A mixture of butter, white wine, pasta, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. 209 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is brought to you by fullbellysisters.blogspot.com. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 83%, which is tremendous. If you like this recipe, take a look at these similar recipes: Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs, Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs, and Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs.

title: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken
summary: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken is a quick and easy dinner option that packs a punch of flavor. This dish contains 400 calories, 30g of protein, and 10g of fat. For $2.00 per serving, it covers 25% of your daily vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 2. Ingredients include chicken breast, basil, soy sauce, and chili peppers. 340 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is brought to you by exampleblog.com. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 30 minutes. It scores 85% in terms of health and taste.

steps.step: Slice the chicken breasts into thin strips. Wash and dry the fresh basil leaves. Slice the chili peppers thinly.

Heat a large pan or wok over medium-high heat. Add a little oil to the pan. Once the oil is hot, add the sliced chicken breasts. Stir-fry the chicken until it is fully cooked and no longer pink, about 5-7 minutes.
Add the sliced chili peppers to the pan. Stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes until the peppers soften.
Pour in the soy sauce and add the salt. Stir well to coat the chicken evenly with the sauce.
Add the fresh basil leaves to the pan. Stir-fry for an additional 1-2 minutes until the basil is wilted and fragrant.
Remove the pan from the heat. Serve the Spicy Thai Basil Chicken hot with steamed rice or noodles. Enjoy your flavorful and spicy Thai Basil Chicken!

instructions:
### Instructions
1. **Prepare the Ingredients**:
   - Slice the chicken breasts into thin strips.
   - Wash and dry the fresh basil leaves.
   - Slice the chili peppers thinly.

2. **Cook the Chicken**:
   - Heat a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
   - Add a little oil to the pan.
   - Once the oil is hot, add the sliced chicken breasts.
   - Stir-fry the chicken until it is fully cooked and no longer pink, about 5-7 minutes.

3. **Add the Chili Peppers**:
   - Add the sliced chili peppers to the pan.
   - Stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes until the peppers soften.

4. **Season and Stir-fry**:
   - Pour in the soy sauce and add the salt.
   - Stir well to coat the chicken evenly with the sauce.

5. **Add the Basil**:
   - Add the fresh basil leaves to the pan.
   - Stir-fry for an additional 1-2 minutes until the basil is wilted and fragrant.

6. **Serve**:
   - Remove the pan from the heat.
   - Serve the Spicy Thai Basil Chicken hot with steamed rice or noodles.

Enjoy your flavorful and spicy Thai Basil Chicken!

title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
summary: Lemon Garlic Shrimp is a delightful seafood dish bursting with flavors. This recipe provides 320 calories, 25g of protein, and 12g of fat per serving. It costs $3.50 per serving and covers 15% of your daily vitamins and minerals. Enjoy this dish that serves 4, made with shrimp, lemon, garlic, and parsley. 280 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is brought to you by exampleblog.com. From preparation to the plate, it takes approximately 20 minutes. This recipe scores 90% in terms of health and taste.

steps.step: Peel and devein the shrimp. Mince the garlic and chop the parsley. Slice the lemon into wedges.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until they turn pink and opaque, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Squeeze lemon juice over the shrimp. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Sprinkle chopped parsley on top. Toss everything together gently.
Remove from heat and serve the Lemon Garlic Shrimp hot, garnished with lemon wedges. Enjoy!

instructions:
### Instructions
1. **Prepare the Ingredients**:
   - Peel and devein the shrimp.
   - Mince the garlic and chop the parsley.
   - Slice the lemon into wedges.

2. **Cook the Shrimp**:
   - Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
   - Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
   - Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until they turn pink and opaque, about 3-4 minutes per side.

3. **Add Lemon and Season**:
   - Squeeze lemon juice over the shrimp.
   - Season with salt and pepper to taste.
   - Sprinkle chopped parsley on top. Toss everything together gently.

4. **Serve**:
   - Remove from heat and serve the Lemon Garlic Shrimp hot, garnished with lemon wedges. Enjoy!

title: Caprese Salad with Balsamic Glaze
summary: Caprese Salad with Balsamic Glaze is a classic Italian dish showcasing fresh flavors. This recipe contains 250 calories, 8g of protein, and 18g of fat per serving. It costs $2.50 per serving and covers 10% of your daily vitamins and minerals. Serves 2, made with tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and balsamic glaze. 180 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is brought to you by exampleblog.com. From preparation to the plate, it takes approximately 15 minutes. This recipe scores 95% in terms of health and taste.

steps.step: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds. Arrange them alternately on a serving plate.
Tear fresh basil leaves and scatter them over the tomatoes and mozzarella.
Drizzle the caprese salad with balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste.
Serve immediately as a fresh and flavorful appetizer or side dish.

instructions:
### Instructions
1. **Prepare the Ingredients**:
   - Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds.
   - Arrange them alternately on a serving plate.
   - Tear fresh basil leaves and scatter them over the tomatoes and mozzarella.

2. **Drizzle with Balsamic Glaze**:
   - Drizzle the caprese salad with balsamic glaze.

3. **Season and Serve**:
   - Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste.
   - Serve immediately as a fresh and flavorful appetizer or side dish.

title: Arancini
summary: Arancini are delicious Italian rice balls that are crispy on the outside and filled with a savory mixture of rice, cheese, and sometimes meat. This dish contains 300 calories, 8g of protein, and 15g of fat per serving. For $2.00 per serving, it covers 15% of your daily vitamins and minerals.

steps.step: In a saucepan, heat the chicken broth until it simmers. Keep warm over low heat.
In a large pot, melt 2 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Add the finely chopped onion and cook until translucent.
Add the Arborio rice and cook, stirring constantly, for 2-3 minutes until lightly toasted.
Pour in the white wine and cook until absorbed.

Add a ladle of warm chicken broth to the rice, stirring constantly until absorbed. Continue adding broth, one ladle at a time, until the rice is creamy and cooked through. Remove from heat and stir in grated Parmesan cheese. Allow the risotto to cool completely.
Take a small handful of cooled risotto and flatten it in your palm. Place a cube of mozzarella in the center and form the rice around it into a ball. Repeat with the remaining risotto.
Dredge each rice ball in flour, then dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs. Set aside on a baking sheet.
In a deep fryer or large pot, heat vegetable oil to 180°C (350°F). Fry the rice balls in batches until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels.
Serve the Arancini warm, optionally with marinara sauce for dipping.

instructions:
### Instructions
1. **Prepare the Risotto**:
   - In a saucepan, heat the chicken broth until it simmers. Keep warm over low heat.
   - In a large pot, melt 2 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Add the finely chopped onion and cook until translucent.
   - Add the Arborio rice and cook, stirring constantly, for 2-3 minutes until lightly toasted.
   - Pour in the white wine and cook until absorbed.
   - Add a ladle of warm chicken broth to the rice, stirring constantly until absorbed. Continue adding broth, one ladle at a time, until the rice is creamy and cooked through. Remove from heat and stir in grated Parmesan cheese. Allow the risotto to cool completely.

2. **Form the Arancini**:
   - Take a small handful of cooled risotto and flatten it in your palm. Place a cube of mozzarella in the center and form the rice around it into a ball. Repeat with the remaining risotto.

3. **Bread the Arancini**:
   - Dredge each rice ball in flour, then dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs. Set aside on a baking sheet.

4. **Fry the Arancini**:
   - In a deep fryer or large pot, heat vegetable oil to 180°C (350°F). Fry the rice balls in batches until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels.

5. **Serve**:
   - Serve the Arancini warm, optionally with marinara sauce for dipping.

title: Teriyaki Mushroom Cream Pasta
summary: Teriyaki Mushroom Cream Pasta combines the rich flavors of teriyaki with creamy pasta and savory mushrooms. This dish contains 400 calories, 12g of protein, and 20g of fat per serving. For $3.50 per serving, it covers 20% of your daily vitamins and minerals.

steps.step: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add sliced mushrooms and sauté until golden brown and tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Reduce heat to low. Stir in minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in teriyaki sauce and heavy cream. Stir well and simmer for 5 minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat evenly with the sauce.
Garnish with chopped parsley and grated Parmesan cheese if desired. Serve immediately.

instructions:
### Instructions
1. **Cook the Pasta**:
   - Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.

2. **Prepare the Teriyaki Mushroom Sauce**:
   - In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add sliced mushrooms and sauté until golden brown and tender, about 5-7 minutes.
   - Reduce heat to low. Stir in minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
   - Pour in teriyaki sauce and heavy cream. Stir well and simmer for 5 minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
   - Season with salt and pepper to taste. Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat evenly with the sauce.

3. **Serve**:
   - Garnish with chopped parsley and grated Parmesan cheese if desired. Serve immediately.

title: Salmon with Greens and Sliced Almonds
summary: Oven-Baked Salmon with Greens and Sliced Almonds is a nutritious dish packed with omega-3 fatty acids and vitamins. This recipe provides 350 calories, 25g of protein, and 18g of fat per serving. It's gluten-free and costs $5.00 per serving.

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet.
In a mixing bowl, toss mixed greens (Parsley and Coriander) with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread the greens evenly around the salmon on the baking sheet.
Sprinkle sliced almonds over the greens and salmon fillets.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Remove from the oven. Serve the Oven-Baked Salmon with Greens and Sliced Almonds hot, garnished with additional lemon slices if desired.

instructions:
### Instructions
1. **Prepare the Salmon**:
   - Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet.

2. **Prepare the Greens and Almonds**:
   - In a mixing bowl, toss mixed greens (spinach, kale) with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread the greens evenly around the salmon on the baking sheet.
   - Sprinkle sliced almonds over the greens and salmon fillets.

3. **Bake the Salmon**:
   - Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

4. **Serve**:
   - Remove from the oven. Serve the Oven-Baked Salmon with Greens and Sliced Almonds hot, garnished with additional lemon slices if desired.
